name: The Verlox Legends
description:
The Labyrinth

The Labyrinth is a hide and seek style puzzle game that relies heavily on sound. As a creature stalk’s our protagonist through Limbo he must complete tasks without making noise. If the creature is alerted to the player's position, he only has a short period of time to hide before the creature devours his soul.

Development Team:
